direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the bag by adding or removing elements, handling multiple copies.
Both methods interact with the bag's elements and handle object parameters.
Both methods involve operations on the bag's elements, though uniqueSet focuses on creating a set of unique elements.
Both methods involve transforming elements within the bag, though transformedBag applies the transformation to existing elements.
Both methods involve creating a transformed bag, though transformingBag does not transform existing elements.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the bag is a prerequisite for adding elements.
The transform method is invoked within the add method to transform the element before adding it to the bag.
The getCount method can be used to verify the number of elements in the bag after adding, ensuring the add operation was successful.
